courses.name: Networking Basics
CLO: Understand the OSI model and its layers
Configure basic network devices
Implement basic IP addressing

courses.name: Cisco Routing & Switching
CLO: Configure routing protocols like OSPF and EIGRP
Set up VLANs and Inter-VLAN routing
Troubleshoot network issues using Cisco tools

courses.name: Cybersecurity Essentials
CLO: Understand the fundamentals of network security
Identify and mitigate common security threats
Implement security best practices for networks

courses.name: Python for Networking
CLO: Write Python scripts to automate network tasks
Use libraries like Netmiko and NAPALM for network automation
Understand network protocols and how to interact with them using Python

courses.name: Cloud Networking
CLO: Understand cloud networking architecture
Configure and manage virtual networks in cloud environments
Implement hybrid cloud networking solutions

courses.name: Advanced Routing Techniques
CLO: Master advanced routing protocols like BGP and MPLS
Configure route redistribution and policy-based routing
Troubleshoot complex routing issues

courses.name: Network Security
CLO: Understand key concepts in network security
Implement firewalls and intrusion detection systems
Design and deploy secure network infrastructures

courses.name: Wireless Networking
CLO: Understand wireless networking standards (802.11)
Configure and troubleshoot wireless networks
Design secure wireless network infrastructures
